cause.description:
In light of ever-increasing revelations from high-ranking government officials that NASA's publicized projects are neither the best nor only of its kind in existence, one comes to understand that such publicized things as the fleet of Space Shuttles and interplanetary satellites are actually redundant and inferior.
1. NASA's publicized projects are technologically inferior to the U.S. Government's classified space projects and operations.
2. The public should not be forced to pay for meager publicity stunts.
cause.mission: promote the realization of NASA's redundancy.
cause.name: NASA is a Redundant Waste of Tax Dollars
